Running the KickJS project

Launch the SimpleWebServer.jar (simple double click it - Java 6 required) and click the 'Open ...' button to start launch the KickJS project in the browser.

Installing the project on a webserver

Copy all files to a webserver (except for SimpleWebServer.jar).
Modify the index.html to fit your webpage (and rename it if you like).
